SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api

Interface EntitySpawnerContainer

All Superinterfaces:
Activatable, DependencyInjector, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.EntityCollectionSupplier, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.EntitySpawnerListProvider, RootPaneProvider
public interface EntitySpawnerContainer extends com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.EntitySpawnerListProvider, com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.EntityCollectionSupplier, DependencyInjector, Activatable, RootPaneProvider
An EntitySpawnerContainer enables a YaegerScene to use instances of EntitySpawner.

When implementing this interface, the setupEntitySpawners() method needs to be implemented The body of setupEntitySpawners() should be used to add instances of EntitySpawner, using the method addEntitySpawner(EntitySpawner). These spawners will then be registered and added to the GWU.

A EntitySpawner that is instantiated, but not added in this way, will not work.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type

    default void
    addEntitySpawner(EntitySpawner entitySpawner)
    Use this method to add any EntitySpawner that is required by the YaegerScene.

    Call the Updatable.update(long) of all instances of EntitySpawner that were added to this EntitySpawnerContainer.
    default void

    Initialize all instances of EntitySpawner that were added to this EntitySpawnerContainer.
    default void
    registerEntitySpawners()
    Register all instances of EntitySpawner that were added to this EntitySpawnerContainer.
    void
    setupEntitySpawners()
    Only instances of EntitySpawner that are registered with the method addEntitySpawner(EntitySpawner) within this method are registered and will receive an animation update.

  • Method Details

    • addEntitySpawner

      default void addEntitySpawner(EntitySpawner entitySpawner)
      Use this method to add any EntitySpawner that is required by the YaegerScene.
      Parameters:
      entitySpawner - the EntitySpawner that needs to be added

    • initSpawners

      default void initSpawners()
      Initialize all instances of EntitySpawner that were added to this EntitySpawnerContainer.

    • registerEntitySpawners

      default void registerEntitySpawners()
      Register all instances of EntitySpawner that were added to this EntitySpawnerContainer.

      Note: This method is part of the internal API, and should not be used when implementing a Yaeger game.

    • setupEntitySpawners

      void setupEntitySpawners()
      Only instances of EntitySpawner that are registered with the method addEntitySpawner(EntitySpawner) within this method are registered and will receive an animation update.

    • callEntitySpawners

      default Updatable callEntitySpawners()
      Call the Updatable.update(long) of all instances of EntitySpawner that were added to this EntitySpawnerContainer.

      Note: This method is part of the internal API, and should not be used when implementing a Yaeger game.

      Returns:
      an Updatable that delegates the Updatable.update(long)
